full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 243 of 261 1404
LC6Cmax7 Meder - direct
1 Q. What is it?
2 A. It's a CD from 1B26 that I reviewed from the Epstein and Maxwell investigation.
3 Q. Now, is this the CD itself or an image from the CD?
4 A. An image.
5 Q. Before conducting your review that we've been talking about here today, did you familiarize yourself with the physical appearance of certain individuals?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. So did you become familiar with the physical appearance of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. Who are the individuals in Government Exhibit 304?
10 A. Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
11 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this exhibit in evidence.
12 MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, may we have a sidebar, please.
13 THE COURT: We'll stop for the night, given that. Members of the jury, thank you so much. Same schedule tomorrow. Appreciate your diligence and patience. We'll see you in the morning. Have a goodnight.
14 (Continued on next page)
15 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
16 DOJ-OGR-00018580

1 Q. What is it?
2 A. It's a CD from 1B26 that I reviewed from the Epstein and Maxwell investigation.
3 Q. Now, is this the CD itself or an image from the CD?
4 A. An image.
5 Q. Before conducting your review that we've been talking about here today, did you familiarize yourself with the physical appearance of certain individuals?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. So did you become familiar with the physical appearance of Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein?
8 A. Yes.
9 Q. Who are the individuals in Government Exhibit 304?
10 A. Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein.
11 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, the government offers this exhibit in evidence.
12 MS. MENNINGER: Your Honor, may we have a sidebar, please.
13 THE COURT: We'll stop for the night, given that. Members of the jury, thank you so much. Same schedule tomorrow. Appreciate your diligence and patience. We'll see you in the morning. Have a goodnight.
